title: Council Decision of 3 August 2000 amending Decision 1999/319/CFSP implementing Common Position 1999/318/CFSP concerning additional restrictive measures against the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia
header:
Council Decision
of 3 August 2000
amending Decision 1999/319/CFSP implementing Common Position 1999/318/CFSP concerning additional restrictive measures against the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia
(2000/495/CFSP)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Common Position 1999/318/CFSP(1) adopted by the Council on 10 May 1999 concerning additional restrictive measures against the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia (FRY) and in particular Article 1(1) thereof, in conjunction with Article 23(2) of the Treaty on European Union,
Taking into account Council Common Position 2000/56/CFSP(2);
Whereas:
(1) By implementing Decision 1999/319/CFSP(3) the Council adopted a list of persons reported for non-admission in the Member States.
(2) This list needs to be updated,
main_body:
Article 1 of Decision 1999/319/CFSP shall be replaced by the following:
"Article 1
The persons to which the obligation of non-admission referred to in Article 1 of Common Position 1999/318/CFSP applies are the following:
>TABLE>"
This Decision shall take effect on the date of its adoption.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 August 2000.
For the Council
The President
H. VĂŠdrine
(1) OJ L 123, 13.5.1999, p. 1. Common Position as amended by Common Position 2000/176/CFSP (OJ L 56, 1.3.2000, p. 1).
(2) OJ L 21, 26.1.2000, p. 4.
(3) OJ L 123, 13.5.1999, p. 3. Decision as last amended by Decision 2000/370/CFSP (OJ L 134, 7.6.2000, p. 1).
